org.opengrok.indexer.analysis

Class Ctags

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opengrok.indexer.analysis.Ctags
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resettable

    public class Ctags
extends Object
implements Resettable
    Provides Ctags by having a running subprocess of ctags.
    Author:
    Chandan
